name: Picnic Sausage Bread
author: Veronica
summary: This quick and easy recipe is great for outdoor picnics, ball games, or when you are out fishing! Feel free to add your favorite pizza toppings in the roll!
ingredients: 1 pound Italian sausage roll (such as Jimmy Dean®)
1 (13.8 ounce) package refrigerated pizza dough (such as Pillsbury®)
1 tablespoon olive oil, or as needed
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Cook and stir sausage in a skillet over medium heat until crumbly, evenly browned, and no longer pink, 8 to 10 minutes
Drain and discard any excess grease
Spread pizza dough evenly onto a 9x13-inch baking sheet; sprinkle with sausage and mozzarella cheese
Roll the dough around the sausage and mozzarella, using the method similar to rolling a cinnamon roll
Crimp the roll closed; place seam side down on baking sheet
Brush the roll with olive oil
Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown and a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean, 15 to 20 minutes
